metadata.title: CVE-2012-4455 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: openCryptoki 2.4.1 allows local users to create or set world-writablepermissions on arbitrary files via a symlink attack on the (1)LCK..opencryptoki or (2) LCK..opencryptoki_stdll file in /var/lock/.

criterions.comment: opencryptoki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
